extendedInfo.description: Why having multiple apps in your smartphone if you can have them all in one?MultiTool gives this chance, as it gathers, all in one, the commonest tools and utilities for smartphones. It consistsin 9 utilities: flashlight, compass/map, notepad, units converter, timer, stopwatch, percentage calculator, device's info, and equation solver. UTILITIES- Flashlight: It uses the brightness of the screen and the flash of the camera to turn your device into a flashlight.- Compass/Map: Utility that consists of a compass and a map that can position you when you have the GPS on.- Notepad: Classical notepad that allows you to take notes wherever you want in the easiest way.- Units Converter: You will be able to convert unities of different magnitudes very fast with this tool.- Chronometer: Intuitive chronometer that shows you partial laps.- Timer: Practical timer that will warn you at the end of the countdown.- Percentage calculator: It can calculate increase and discount of a percentage (VAT, bargains...).- Device's info: It shows you all the technical information of your device, such as the Android version or the screen resolution.- Equation solver: By introducing the coefficients of the equation, this tool calculates the solutions of that equation.Â¡What's more, it allows you to erase the data dynamically!You can do it by shaking the smartphone from side to side, or you can move the hand above the screen from right to left, or vice versa.You can buy an ad-free version of MultiTool!If you find any bug or you have any suggestion, don't hesitate to contact us!(Note: The access to camera's LED depends on the manufaturer and the model of your device. If you find out that the LED flashlight is not running on your device, we would thank you if you could send us an email informing about your device model, so we could add more supported devices for that function.)
